description:
A Mii Gunner costume of Barret from the FINAL FANTASY series is now available for purchase! Represent the leader of Avalanche well as you tear up the battlefield with the Gatling Gun arm and launch opponents to the stars.

This content includes
Mii Fighter Costume
・Barret's Outfit (for Gunner)
Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.
name: 【Costume】Barret's Outfit
